name: Food
description: Please place in black food bin with an optional biodegradable bag. Items accepted include: Meat and fish (including bones), Fruit and vegetables, Dairy, Egg shells, Bread, cakes and pastries, Rice, pasta and beans, Uneaten or leftover food, Teabags and coffee grounds
recycleWith: Food only, NO OIL OR FAT

name: Cooking Oil
description: NOT TO BE PLACED IN THE BLACK FOOD BIN. Take used cooking oil to a recycling centre, or soak in newspaper or kitchen roll and place in the food bin.
recycleWith: Food (if soaked up) or at a recycling centre

name: Biodegradable Cutlery / Plates
description: Not accepted in recycling

name: Paper (not brown)
description: Incluses newspaper, magazines, catalogues, directories, Yellow Pages, junk mail, white paper and white envelopes, white based wrapping paper, greetings cards and small amounts of shredded paper (no more than 2 carrier bags at a time). NOTE, CARDBOARD AND BROWN PAPER ARE TO BE SEPERATED FROM PAPER.

name: Cardboard
description: Remove all plastic, sticky tape and polystyrene before putting out for recycling and flatten. Place in blue bag.

name: Cartons (food and drink containers)
description: Remove all plastic, sticky tape and polystyrene before putting out for recycling and flatten. Place in blue bag.

name: Brown paper
description: Remove all plastic, sticky tape and polystyrene before putting out for recycling and flatten. Place in blue bag.

name: Plastic Bottles and food packaging
description: Any plastic bottles (including drinks, shampoo and bleach bottles - rinse, squash and replace the lid), plus pots, tubs and trays used ot hold food. NOTE: NO BLACK PLASTIC.

name: Black plastic
description: Not recyclable

name: Scruncable plastic
description: Not recyclable

name: Glass bottles and jars
description: Please rinse, labels and lids can be left on. NOTE: NO BROKEN GLASS OR OTHER TYPES (E.g.  Pyrex, tumblers and window panes).

name: Pyrex
description: Non recyclable

name: Cans, tins and aerosols
description: Please remove lids from aerosols and ensure they are empty.

name: Aluminium Foil
description: Please clean and flatten. No silver plascic (obtains original shape after scrunching) or paper backed foils.

name: Clothes and Shoes
description: Place in a labelled plastic bad (no black bags or charity bags) and leave with recycling. Ensure items are clean and dry.

name: Duvets and pillows
description: Not recyclable.

name: Electronic devices (small, EXCLUDING mobile phones)
description: Devices including small electronic devices (eg cameras), small electrical personal care (eg hairdryers), small electrical appliances (eg kettles), small DIY and garden electricals (eg drills) - Please place your electrical items in an untied plastic carrier bag next to your green recycling box. NOTE: Nothing too large to fit into a plastic bag.

name: Batteries
description: All types accpeted. Place in a small bag on top of a recycling box. Car batteries are to be placed next to a recycling box.

name: Engine oil and filters
description: Place oil in a sealed oil container. Wrap filtes in a bag to avoid leaks.

name: Mobile phones
description: Place with other recycling in a bag.

name: Printer ink carterages
description: Place in original packaging or new carterage packaging if possible.

name: Spectacles
description: Only unbroken spectacles are available.
